titleStmt.title: A Sabbath of rest to be kept by the saints here, or, A treatise of the Sabbath, and such holy and religious duties as are required for the sanctification of it, the great Sabbath of rest that remaineth to be kept by God's saints hereafter delivered in divers sermons upon Heb. 4. 9. / by Nicholas Smith ...
titleStmt.author: Smith, Nicholas, d. 1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for Samuel Crouch ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
